programme.desc: S7:E2 While near death, Sara is greeted by a long lost family member . Nardo returns to the BCPD. Pete is frantic over Vivian. Evan has a close call. Lex stays close to Sara.

programme.desc: S7:E3 Pete, Caleb, and RJ meet with BCPD for an update. Evan has an unexpected visitor from his past. Sara is surprised to see Lee.

programme.title: Sharkmania: The Top 15 Biggest Baddest Bloodiest Bites
programme.desc: We take a fun look back at the 15 biggest, baddest, bloodiest, bad-assed shark movie bites of all time. This adrenaline filled special event program features the funniest comedians, actors and other celebrities giving us the 411 on their most favorite movie shark attacks from those films.
